## Biography

Noel is working in Dr. Johnathan Haines' lab. She is studying Alzheimer's Disease and Age Related Macular Degeneration in the Amish population. After gaining experience working in a wet lab environment during her undergraduate schooling, she is enjoying stepping into the field of computational genetics and biostatistics.
